Artemis::

"Yes I can" she said while she smiled and added "We should go now... 
lead the way JetV"

> "You can handle all that?" he quesioned...
> "We should get going...."

turned

lived

heading

when
> > you

> > > > > > > > out." He screams along the freeway, and cuts off a 
cuts

> > > > > > > > freighter, showing them his feelings. The unkind words

Autobot

> > > > > > already

> > very
> > > > > > upset.

problem

> > > > > > > > > asked, knowing there is. "YES THERE PROBLEM" 
Grimlock
> > > > yelled,

> > > > EVEN
> > > > > > WHOLE

as he
> > > > pointed

and
> > in

> > energy

room.
> > This

if

> > > > of us

calmly. "None
> > of us
> > > > > > can go".

> > sword
> > > > just
> > > > > > above

the

> > > > of
